data.comment: The match is underway at Weserstadion.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Bremen.
Sascha Stegemann signals a throw-in for Hertha, close to Bremen's area.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 8, In Bremen Bremen's Theodor Gebre Selassie is caught offside.
Throw-in Hertha.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Bremen.
In the minute 13, Davy Klaassen of Bremen gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 16, Hertha to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Hertha close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Can Hertha capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
In the minute 23, Tahith Chong (Bremen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Hertha at Weserstadion.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 27, Sascha Stegemann awards Bremen a goal kick.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 31, Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Goal kick for Hertha at Weserstadion.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Bremen.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Throw-in for Hertha at Weserstadion.
In the minute 36, Hertha needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Weserstadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Yuya Osako, who is down injured.
In the minute 38, Krzysztof Piatek of Hertha is pulled up for offside.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
Yuya Osako has recovered and rejoins the match in Bremen.
In the minute 39, Bremen pushes forward through Yuya Osako, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Bremen throw-in in Hertha's half.
In the minute 42, Peter Pekarik is on target to give Hertha a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Maximilian Mittelstadt.
Hertha have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hertha close to the penalty box.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
It's now 0-2 in Bremen as Dodi Lukebakio scores for Hertha.
Vladimir Darida with an assist there.
The second-half is underway at Weserstadion.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Hertha in the half of Bremen.
Leonardo Bittencourt is on a sub for Yuya Osako for Bremen.
Maximilian Eggestein (Bremen) gets a yellow card.
Sascha Stegemann awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Leonardo Bittencourt of Bremen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 49, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
In the minute 51, Free kick Bremen.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Hertha throw-in in Bremen's half.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Jordan Torunarigha for Hertha drives towards goal at Weserstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Hertha needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Hertha.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
The away team replace Krzysztof Piatek with Jhon Cordoba.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 62, Goal! Matheus Cunha extends Hertha's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Vladimir Darida to set up the goal.
In the minute 64, Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
Bremen make their second substitution with Nick Woltemade replacing Davy Klaassen.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
In the minute 67, Hertha have a dangerous throw-in.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davie Selke (Bremen) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-3.
In the minute 69, Ludwig Augustinsson instrumental with a fine assist.
Jhon Cordoba of Hertha smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 72, Hertha attack but Dedryck Boyata's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
